What is
Chipley Station?
Chipley Station
is a tap house and food cart pavilion open to all ages in the heart of downtown Chipley, Florida, across from the historic train station.
We’re now open! Our open-beam building and gathering place features a variety of food trucks with different types of cuisine, craft beers, and a spacious indoor and outdoor area where you can dine, hang out, listen to live music, watch sports on big screen TVs, and experience local arts and crafts.
Our Story
Chipley Station
was envisioned
by three friends who share a passion for food and family. Our goal is to introduce a new concept to the Florida panhandle where people can gather with their community, relax, and enjoy a variety of high-quality foods and beverages served quickly and affordably. Our location will be where people can take their family, go out on a date, host a community event, or go after a big ball game.
As former college teammates at the University of South Alabama, we realized it’s
important
to strive for a goal you believe in and leave the program in a better place than when you got there. We asked another close
friend,
and
teammate,
to join us in this unique endeavor: to create a one-of-a-kind destination in
northwest Florida
that celebrates its friendly people and great weather.
One of our founders married a local Chipley girl. After making our home in the Pacific Northwest and three decades of return visits to the area, we had a local inspiration that laid the groundwork and motivation for starting this project. Thank you, Miss Peanut!
Our team has been developing community-driven spaces and real estate projects for 30 years, and
love
creating an atmosphere that brings people together to celebrate the best local traditions.
We are in “The People Business” and hope to create something special for all to enjoy.
If you are a
food truck operator
interested in Chipley Station, we’d love to hear from you.
Food Truck Inquiries
We’d love to hear from you!
Thanks for reaching out!

Got a Food Truck?
Chipley Station is the Panhandle’s hottest new food truck pavilion with 24 taps, live music, and nonstop crowds. We’re looking for standout trucks to join the lineup. Big flavor? Local following? Let’s talk.
We want to hear from you. Call
(850) 600-0133
or email
[email protected]
for more information.
